title: Enhancing Service Quality Practical Competencies: Strategies for Managing Power Dynamics in Collaborative Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Concepts of Project-Based Learning (PBL) and Team Collaboration Experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three frameworks for analyzing power dynamics within teams.
Learners can classify types of questions arising in project meetings and analyze their connection to power relationships.
Learners can design and execute at least two mediation strategies to balance participation opportunities among team members.
Learners can visualize team dynamics data using online collaboration tools (Mentimeter, Miro, etc.).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
